description: Provides gentle pricing suggestions based on selling patterns and market comparisons

result.suggestion: You might consider slightly adjusting your prices. Other people selling homemade pickles usually charge around 200-250, but if you're charging less, you could think about adding a little more value to your hard work. Your pickle is really good - you could try a small increase!
result.reasoning: In the market, similar homemade pickles tend to sell for a bit more, reflecting the quality and effort involved. Your hard work deserves good value, so your pricing can match market standards.
